title: Toxicity duting the holidays
body:
so this few days its been the most toxic i have ever been (ppl told to kys, the r word, the n word, told to stfu, and said bad things about the parents)
well, this is highly likely because all of the kids are on their holiday and hope on the make fun of others. the game is literally unplayable unless i muted them, which sever my ability to communicate with helpful teamates. I have report everyone of them, hope they all get banned. so if you see a high influx of ban appeals of forum, just ignore them , pleading for forgiveness. they should think before they type it in the first place.
